Question: Band member Lance Bass was openly critical of this person's actions in his memoir Out of Sync.
Hints: This person released his second solo album, FutureSex/LoveSounds, on September 12, 2006.
This person began work on his third studio album The 20/20 Experience in June 2012, with "no rules and/or end goal in mind".
This person also appears in the music video, which was directed by Jonas & François.
